summary.span: 管理用户配置文件数据和设置。

span.span: Manages user profile data and settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 配置文件用于存储和检索数据源（如数据库）中的用户设置。The ASP.NET profile is used to store and retrieve user settings in a data source such as a database. 使用当前的属性访问用户配置文件 。The user profile is accessed using the property of the current . 配置文件信息和属性值使用配置文件提供程序进行管理。Profile information and property values are managed using a profile provider. 类用于管理配置文件设置，搜索用户配置文件，并删除不再使用的用户配置文件。The class is used to manage profile settings, search for user profiles, and delete user profiles that are no longer in use. 类提供可通过引用 应用程序代码中的类来访问的静态方法和属性。The class provides static methods and properties that can be accessed by referencing the class in your application code. 有关示例，请参阅本主题中的 "示例" 部分以及有关类成员的主题中的其他示例 。For an example, see the Example section in this topic and additional examples in the topics for members of the class. 默认情况下，将对所有 ASP.NET 应用程序禁用用户配置文件。By default, the user profile is disabled for all ASP.NET applications. 若要启用用户配置文件，请将 `enabled` [配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))配置元素的属性设置为 true，如以下示例中所示。To enable the user profile, set the `enabled` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element to true, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 有关用户配置文件的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Profile Properties 概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/2y3fs9xs(v=vs.100))。For more information about the user profile, see [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/2y3fs9xs(v=vs.100)). 配置文件提供程序用于存储和检索用户配置文件中的属性。A profile provider is used to store and retrieve properties in the user profile. .NET Framework 包含一个 类，用于在 SQL Server 数据库中存储用户配置文件属性。The .NET Framework includes a class that stores user profile properties in a SQL Server database. 名为的 实例 `AspNetSqlProvider` 在计算机配置中指定为默认配置文件提供程序。A instance named `AspNetSqlProvider` is specified in the machine configuration as the default profile provider. `AspNetSqlProvider`实例连接到本地 Web 服务器上的 SQL Server 数据库。The `AspNetSqlProvider` instance connects to the SQL Server database on the local Web server. 您可以 通过使用[提供程序](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164654(v%3dvs.100))配置元素和配置文件配置元素的特性来指定连接到其他 SQL Server 作为默认配置文件提供程序的， `defaultProvider` 如下面的示例中所示。 [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))You can specify a that connects to another SQL Server as the default profile provider by using the [providers](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164654(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element and the `defaultProvider` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个使用 类管理非活动配置文件的 ASP.NET 页。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that uses the class to manage inactive profiles. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). summary.span: 获取或设置要存储和检索其配置文件信息的应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application for which to store and retrieve profile information.

value.span: 要存储和检索其配置文件信息的应用程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the application for which to store and retrieve profile information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性将配置文件信息与不同的应用程序相关联。The uses the property to associate profile information with different applications. 这使多个应用程序能够使用同一个数据库来存储用户信息，而不会在重复用户之间发生冲突。This enables multiple applications to use the same database to store user information without running into conflicts between duplicate users. 多个 ASP.NET 应用程序可以通过在属性中指定相同的值，来使用相同的用户数据库 。Multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same user database by specifying the same value in the property. 可以通过编程方式设置该属性，也可以通过使用属性以声明方式在 Web 应用程序的配置文件中设置该属性 `applicationName` 。The property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application by using the `applicationName` attribute. 如果没有为 `applicationName` Web 应用程序的配置文件中的属性指定值，则 .NET Framework 中包含的配置文件提供程序使用 ASP.NET 应用程序的属性值。If a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file for the Web application, then the profile providers included with the .NET Framework use the property value for ASP.NET applications. 对于 non-ASP.NET 应用程序，默认值为 属性值，没有文件扩展名。For non-ASP.NET applications, the default value is the property value, without the file extension. 属性公开 默认配置文件提供程序的属性。The property exposes the property of the default profile provider. 默认配置文件提供程序是使用 `defaultProvider` [配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))配置元素的属性指定的。The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 如果用户配置文件包含由配置文件提供程序（而不是默认提供程序）管理的属性，则可以使用不同的应用程序名称来配置这些属性。If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, they may be configured with a different application name. 若要访问默认提供程序以外的配置文件提供程序的应用程序名称，请使用属性获取对配置文件提供程序的引用 并直接访问该 提供程序的属性。To access the application name of a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the property and access the property of the provider directly. > [!CAUTION] > 由于单个默认配置文件提供程序实例用于某个对象提供的所有请求，因此 您可以同时执行多个请求并尝试设置该 属性值。Because a single default profile provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 对于多个写入，属性不是线程安全的，并且更改 属性值可能会导致应用程序的多个用户产生意外行为。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 建议你避免编写允许用户设置属性的代码（ 除非你需要这样做）。It is recommended that you avoid writing code that allows users to set the property unless you require it. 可能需要设置属性的应用程序的一个示例 是管理多个应用程序的配置文件数据的管理应用程序。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages profile data for multiple applications. 此类应用程序应为单用户应用程序，而不是 Web 应用程序。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application. ## Examples 下面的配置文件节选显示 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件的[system.web](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/web/system-web-element-web-settings)节中的[profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))元素。The following configuration file excerpt shows the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) element in the [system.web](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/web/system-web-element-web-settings) section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它将应用程序的默认配置文件提供程序设置为一个 实例，并将设置 为 `MyApplication` 。It sets the application's default profile provider to a instance and sets the to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

span.span: if the user profile will be automatically saved at the end of the execution of an ASP.NET page; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否为应用程序启用自动保存用户配置文件。The property indicates whether automatic saving of the user profile is enabled for the application. 如果启用了自动保存，则在 ASP.NET 页执行结束时，对象将引发事件并调用方法。If automatic saving is enabled, the object raises the event and calls the method during the event at the end of the execution of an ASP.NET page. 属性是使用 `automaticSaveEnabled` ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的[profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))元素的属性设置的。The property is set using the `automaticSaveEnabled` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) element in the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. ## Examples 下面的配置文件节选显示 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件的[system.web](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/web/system-web-element-web-settings)节中的[profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))元素。The following configuration file excerpt shows the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) element in the [system.web](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/web/system-web-element-web-settings) section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它将应用程序的默认配置文件提供程序指定给 实例，并将 `automaticSaveEnabled` 属性设置为 `true` 。It specifies the application's default profile provider to a instance and sets the `automaticSaveEnabled` attribute to `true`. ``` ```

summary.span: 删除上次活动日期和时间出现在指定日期和时间之前的用户配置文件数据。

span.span: Deletes user profile data for which the last activity date and time occurred before the specified date and time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于从配置文件中的属性指定的应用程序的数据源中删除未使用的配置文件数据 `applicationName` 。The method is used to remove unused profile data from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 使用 `authenticationOption` 参数来指定是只想要搜索匿名配置文件、仅限经过身份验证的配置文件还是要搜索的所有配置文件。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 在搜索的配置文件中，将 删除在指定参数值之前或之前出现的任何配置文件 `userInactiveSinceDate` 。Of the searched profiles, any profile with a that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is deleted. 方法调用 默认配置文件提供程序的方法。The method calls the method of the default profile provider. 默认配置文件提供程序是使用 `defaultProvider` [配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))配置元素的属性指定的。The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 如果用户配置文件包含由配置文件提供程序（而不是默认提供程序）管理的属性，则不会删除其他数据源中的配置文件信息。If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, the profile information in the other data source is not deleted. 若要删除由默认提供程序以外的配置文件提供程序管理的不活动配置文件，请使用属性获取对配置文件提供程序的引用， 并 直接调用提供程序的方法。To delete inactive profiles that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the property and call the method of the provider directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了管理不活动配置文件的 ASP.NET 页。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles. 提供了一个按钮以删除指定天数内未使用的所有配置文件，因此这些配置文件被视为不活动。A button is provided to delete all profiles that have been unused for the specified number of days and are therefore considered inactive. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法 `username` 从指定的数据源中删除指定的的用户配置文件的所有配置文件信息和属性 。The method deletes all profile information and properties for the user profile for the specified `username` from the data source for the specified . 方法调用 默认配置文件提供程序的方法以执行删除操作。The method calls the method of the default profile provider to perform the delete operation. 默认配置文件提供程序是使用 `defaultProvider` [配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))配置元素的属性指定的。The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 如果用户配置文件包含由配置文件提供程序（而不是默认提供程序）管理的属性，则不会删除它们。If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, they are not deleted. 若要删除由配置文件提供程序（而不是默认提供程序）管理的配置文件属性，请使用属性获取对配置文件提供程序的引用， 并 直接调用提供程序的方法。To delete profile properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the property and call the method of the provider directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了管理不活动配置文件的 ASP.NET 页。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles. 选择要删除的一个配置文件时，将调用方法。The method is called when a single profile is selected to be deleted. 配置文件是否被视为处于不活动状态基于为 `userInactiveSinceDate` 传递给方法的参数值指定的日期 。Whether a profile is considered inactive is based on the date specified for the `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value passed to the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从属性指定的应用程序的数据源中删除指定配置文件的所有配置文件信息和属性 。The method deletes all profile information and properties for the specified profiles from the data source for the application specified by the property. 要删除的配置文件列表指定为用户名的字符串数组。The list of profiles to delete is specified as a string array of user names. 如果参数中的用户名的配置文件属性和信息在数据源中存在 `usernames` ，则会将其删除。If profile properties and information exist in the data source for a user name in the `usernames` parameter, they are deleted. 返回值可能不同于指定数组的长度 `usernames` 。The return value may differ from the length of the specified array of `usernames`. 这表明指定数组中的某些配置文件 `usernames` 已从数据存储中删除。This indicates that some of the profiles in the specified array of `usernames` were already deleted from the data store. 方法调用 默认配置文件提供程序的方法。The method calls the method of the default profile provider. 默认配置文件提供程序是使用 `defaultProvider` [配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))配置元素的属性指定的。The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 如果用户配置文件包含由配置文件提供程序（而不是默认提供程序）管理的属性，则不会删除它们。If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, they are not deleted. 若要删除由配置文件提供程序（而不是默认提供程序）管理的配置文件属性，请使用属性获取对配置文件提供程序的引用， 并 直接调用提供程序的方法。To delete profile properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the property and call the method of the provider directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了管理不活动配置文件的 ASP.NET 页。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles. 控件显示返回的不活动配置文件。A control displays the inactive profiles returned. 控件的每一行 都包含一个按钮，该按钮通过调用方法从数据源中删除该行的配置文件 。Each row of the control includes a button that deletes the profile for that row from the data source with a call to the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回一个列表，其中的用户名与所配置的属性值的所提供的 `usernameToMatch` 参数值相匹配 。The method returns a list of all profile information for which the user name matches the supplied `usernameToMatch` parameter value for the configured property value. 使用 `authenticationOption` 参数来指定是只想要搜索匿名配置文件、仅限经过身份验证的配置文件还是要搜索的所有配置文件。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 使用 采用附加 `pageIndex` 参数和参数的方法的重载，可以在数据页中检索用户配置文件的配置文件信息 `pageSize` 。You can retrieve profile information for user profiles in pages of data using the overload for the method that takes additional `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. 请注意，您的配置文件提供程序可能支持参数中的通配符 `usernameToMatch` 。Note that your profile provider may support wildcard characters in the `usernameToMatch` parameter. 例如，类的 方法 支持参数中的通配符 `usernameToMatch` 。For example, the method of the class supports wildcard characters in the `usernameToMatch` parameter. 方法调用 默认配置文件提供程序的方法。The method calls the method of the default profile provider. 默认配置文件提供程序是使用 `defaultProvider` [配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))配置元素的属性指定的。The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 如果用户配置文件包含由配置文件提供程序（而不是默认提供程序）管理的属性，则不会搜索其他配置文件提供程序的数据源。If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, the data source for the other profile provider is not searched. 若要查找由配置文件提供程序（而不是默认提供程序）管理的配置文件，请使用属性获取对配置文件提供程序的引用， 并 直接调用提供程序的方法。To find profiles that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the property and call the method of the provider directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例允许用户提供 `usernameToMatch` 值和 枚举值，并检索任何匹配配置文件的配置文件信息。The following code example allows a user to supply a `usernameToMatch` value and a enumeration value and retrieves profile information for any matching profiles. 该示例允许用户指定是否以独占方式返回非活动配置文件。The example allows the user to specify whether to return inactive profiles exclusively. 如果用户仅指定不活动的配置文件，则 调用方法; 否则，将 调用方法。If the user specifies only inactive profiles, the method is called; otherwise, the method is called. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于从数据源 `applicationName` 中为配置文件中的属性指定的应用程序的所有未使用的用户配置文件检索配置文件信息。The method is used to retrieve profile information from the data source for all unused user profiles for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 使用 `authenticationOption` 参数来指定是只想要搜索匿名配置文件、仅限经过身份验证的配置文件还是要搜索的所有配置文件。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 在搜索配置文件中，返回的任何配置文件都 在指定的参数值上或之前发生 `userInactiveSinceDate` 。Of the searched profiles, any profile is returned that has a that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value. 使用 采用附加 `pageIndex` 参数和参数的方法的重载，可以在数据页中检索非活动用户配置文件的配置文件信息 `pageSize` 。You can retrieve profile information for inactive user profiles in pages of data using the overload for the method that takes additional `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. 方法调用 默认配置文件提供程序的方法。The method calls the method of the default profile provider. 默认配置文件提供程序是使用 `defaultProvider` [配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))配置元素的属性指定的。The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 如果用户配置文件包含由配置文件提供程序（而不是默认提供程序）管理的属性，则不会搜索其他配置文件提供程序的数据源。If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, the data source for the other profile provider is not searched. 若要查找由配置文件提供程序（而不是默认提供程序）管理的未使用的配置文件，请使用属性获取对配置文件提供程序的引用， 并 直接调用提供程序的方法。To find unused profiles that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the property and call the method of the provider directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了管理不活动配置文件的 ASP.NET 页。The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles. 提供了一个用于删除所有不活动配置文件的按钮。A button is provided to delete all inactive profiles. 配置文件是否被视为不活动取决于为参数指定的日期 `userInactiveSinceDate` 。Whether a profile is considered inactive is based on the date specified for the `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))配置元素的属性指定的。The default profile provider is specified using the `defaultProvider` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 如果用户配置文件包含由配置文件提供程序（而不是默认提供程序）管理的属性，则不会搜索其他配置文件提供程序的数据源。If the user profile contains properties that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, the data source for the other profile provider is not searched. 若要查找由配置文件提供程序（而不是默认提供程序）管理的配置文件，请使用属性获取对配置文件提供程序的引用， 并 直接调用提供程序的方法。To find profiles that are managed by a profile provider other than the default provider, obtain a reference to the profile provider using the property and call the method of the provider directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了管理不活动配置文件的 ASP.NET 网页。The following code example shows an ASP.NET Web page that manages inactive profiles. 提供了一个用于删除所有不活动配置文件的按钮。A button is provided to delete all inactive profiles. 配置文件是否被视为不活动取决于为参数指定的日期 `userInactiveSinceDate` 。Whether a profile is considered inactive is based on the date specified for the `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于从配置文件中的属性指定的应用程序的数据源检索所有未使用的用户配置文件的计数 `applicationName` 。The method is used to retrieve a count of all of the unused user profiles from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file. 使用 `authenticationOption` 参数来指定是只想要搜索匿名配置文件、仅限经过身份验证的配置文件还是要搜索的所有配置文件。Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched. 在搜索的配置文件中，所有配置文件都是 在指定的参数值之前或之前发生的计数 `userInactiveSinceDate` 。Of the searched profiles, all profiles are counted that have a that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例允许用户根据搜索条件查看和删除活动和非活动配置文件的信息。The following code example allows a user to view and delete information for active and inactive profiles based on search criteria. 使用方法的结果显示非活动配置文件的计数 。A count of inactive profiles is displayed using the results of the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性引用为应用程序启用的所有配置文件提供程序，包括在计算机配置中添加的提供程序和在所有 Web.config 文件中添加的提供程序。The property references all of the profile providers enabled for an application, including providers added in the machine configuration and providers added in all Web.config files. 您可以使用配置文件中[配置](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))文件部分的 "[提供](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164654(v%3dvs.100))程序" 元素控制哪些配置文件提供程序可用于应用程序。You can control which profile providers are available for an application using the [providers](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164654(v%3dvs.100)) element of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) section in the configuration file. 例如，以下 Web.config 文件会删除在父配置文件中指定的配置文件提供程序，并添加 实例作为应用程序的配置文件提供程序。For example, the following Web.config file removes the profile providers specified in parent configuration files and adds a instance as the profile provider for the application. ``` ``` 指定[配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))部分时，必须通过设置属性来指定默认提供程序 `defaultProvider` 。When specifying the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) section, you must specify a default provider by setting the `defaultProvider` attribute. 如果未在 Web.config 文件中指定节，则将使用计算机配置中的值，并将 名为 AspNetSqlProvider 的实例建立为默认提供程序。If you do not specify a section in your Web.config file, the values from the machine configuration are used and the instance named AspNetSqlProvider is established as the default provider. 你可以从集合中获取对提供程序的强类型引用 ，方法是按名称对配置文件提供程序进行索引，并将其强制转换为所需的类型。You can obtain a strongly typed reference to a provider from the collection by indexing the profile provider by name and casting it as the desired type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例列出了为应用程序以及其各自的类型启用的提供程序。The following code example lists the providers enabled for an application and their respective types.
